tutorialSidebar.label: Module 3: NVIDIA Isaac — AI Brain & Perception

appendices/code-examples.title: Appendix B: Code Examples
appendices/code-examples.description: This appendix contains additional code examples that supplement the material in the main chapters.

appendices/environment-setup.title: Appendix A: Environment Setup
appendices/environment-setup.description: This appendix provides detailed instructions for setting up your development environment to work with the examples in this book.

appendices/further-reading.title: Appendix D: Further Reading
appendices/further-reading.description: This appendix provides additional resources for continuing your learning journey in humanoid robotics.

appendices/glossary.title: Appendix C: Glossary
appendices/glossary.description: This appendix contains definitions for key terms used throughout the book.

chapters/digital-twin-simulation.title: Chapter 2: Digital Twin Simulation
chapters/digital-twin-simulation.description: This chapter will cover Gazebo and Unity integration for humanoid robotics digital twins.

chapters/isaac-perception.title: Chapter 3: NVIDIA Isaac Perception
chapters/isaac-perception.description: This chapter will cover NVIDIA Isaac for AI perception in humanoid robotics.

chapters/vla-humanoid.title: Chapter 4: VLA Humanoid Robotics
chapters/vla-humanoid.description: This chapter will cover Vision-Language-Action paradigms for humanoid robotics.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: Welcome to the Humanoid Robotics Book! This comprehensive guide will take you through the essential concepts and technologies needed to understand and develop humanoid robots.
